= Feature list =

Hi this is a list of Snake-Os features.

The goal to have knowledge of SnakeOs programs, scripts, enhancements workarounds.

Feel free to extend this list.

|| Name         || Description || Further info||
|| Filesystem|| ext2,ext3, FAT, NTFS||See [http://snake-os.googlecode.com/files/SNAKE_OS_V1_20091027_User_Manual.pdf User Manual]||
|| Network filesystem|| Samba 1.1 ||See [http://snake-os.googlecode.com/files/SNAKE_OS_V1_20091027_User_Manual.pdf User Manual] ||
|| Transmission 2.0 || Torrent Client ||See [http://snake-os.googlecode.com/files/SNAKE_OS_V1_20091027_User_Manual.pdf User Manual] ||
|| FTP server|| VSFTP server ||See  [http://snake-os.googlecode.com/files/SNAKE_OS_V1_20091027_User_Manual.pdf User Manual] ||
